columns.name: I_TRANSACTION_NO
columns.description: The transaction identifier for the shipment ship unit line data of the tracking event.

columns.name: I_REC_NO
columns.description: The record number primary key identifier for the tracking event specified.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service identifier that is being reported against with the tracking event being reported.

columns.name: SERVICE_DURATION
columns.description: The time duration that occurred for the special service on the tracking event.

columns.name: SERVICE_DURATION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The service duration unit of measure.

columns.name: SERVICE_DURATION_BASE
columns.description: The service duration in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SERVICE_TIME
columns.description: The time for the special service activity on the tracking event.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight for the special service activity recorded on the tracking event for the shipment.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The special service weight unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The special service weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume for the special service activity recorded on the tracking event for the shipment.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The special service volume unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The special service volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DISTANCE
columns.description: The distance for the special service activity recorded on the tracking event for the shipment.

columns.name: DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The special service distance unit of measure.

columns.name: DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: The special service distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ITEM_COUNT
columns.description: The item piece count for the special service activity recorded on the tracking event for the shipment.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The ship unit count for the special service activity recorded on the tracking event for the shipment.

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: The monthly range partition to manage purging status messages.

columns.name: SERVICE_COMPLETION_STATE
columns.description: An indication if the special service activity was completed with the tracking event.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
